welcome_message_body: Welcome to Streetsboro, the charming city known for its beautiful nature trails, local wineries, and friendly community. We hope you enjoy your stay and take some time to discover all that our city has to offer. Happy exploring!

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Fulton International Airport handles all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Fulton International Airport is responsible for all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Akron/canton Regional Airport is the primary hub for all passenger flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Akron/canton Regional Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal serves all commercial flights and features a variety of amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: This terminal caters to private and charter flights, providing a comfortable and efficient experience for private jet travelers.

wifi.note: Free wifi is available throughout the airport for all travelers.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Hopkins International Airport serves both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Concourse A
terminals.description: Concourse A is primarily used for domestic flights and is connected to the main terminal via a walkway.

terminals.name: Concourse B
terminals.description: Concourse B serves both domestic and international flights and can be accessed through the main terminal or Concourse A.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport for all passengers.
